  1: <?php
  2:     
  3:     namespace PowerCMS\Helper; 
  4:     
  5:     use PowerCMS\Exception\PowerExceptionNotFound;
  6:     
  7:     /**
  8:      * PowerHelperApplication
  9:      * @since 1.0.0
 10:      */
 11:     class PowerHelperApplication {
 12:         
 13:         /**
 14:          * Const nome da key para opção minify 
 15:          */
 16:         const KEY_MINIFY           = "powercms_minify";
 17:         
 18:         /**
 19:          * Const nome da key para opção route 
 20:          */
 21:         const KEY_ROUTER           = "powercms_route_app";
 22:         
 23:         /**
 24:          * Const nome da key para opção route do PowerCMS
 25:          */
 26:         const KEY_ROUTER_POWERCMS  = "powercms_route";
 27:         
 28:         /**
 29:          * Const nome da key para opção route do PowerCMS
 30:          */
 31:         const KEY_IMAGE  = "powercms_image";
 32:         
 33:         /**
 34:          * Const Classe default, classe que é chamada como página inicial do app 
 35:          */
 36:         const CLASS_DEFAULT        = "Index";
 37:         
 38:         /**
 39:          * Const Metodo default, função principal da classe executada
 40:          */
 41:         const METHOD_DEFAULT       = "main";
 42:         
 43:         /**
 44:          * Const namespace do Controller da APP
 45:          */
 46:         const NAMESPACE_CONTROLLER = "App\\Controller\\";
 47:         
 48:         /**
 49:          * Const namespace do Controller do PowerCMS
 50:          */
 51:         const NAMESPACE_CONTROLLER_POWERCMS = "PowerCMS\\Controller\\";
 52:         
 53:         /**
 54:          * Const namespace do Controller do PowerCMS Setup
 55:          */
 56:         const NAMESPACE_CONTROLLER_POWERCMS_SETUP = "PowerCMS\\Controller\\Setup\\";        
 57:                 
 58:         /**
 59:          * Módulo para executar, os Controller e as Views possui módulos, como isso
 60:          * podemos executar uma mesma aplicação com diferentes Controllers e Diferentes 
 61:          * Views. 
 62:          *  
 63:          * @var String modulo 
 64:          */
 65:         private static $_module; 
 66:         private $_routes;
 67:         
 68:         /**
 69:          * Faz a compressão do código dos arquivos CSS e JS
 70:          * 
 71:          * @param String $file endereço do arquivo
 72:          * @return String 
 73:          */
 74:         private static function minify($file) 
 75:         { 
 76:             $pathname = str_replace("//", DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, POWERCMS_PATH_PUBLIC . "/");
 77:             $filename = $pathname . $file;
 78:             if(!file_exists($filename)) { 
 79:                 $extension = str_replace(array(".", "/"), "", strrchr($file, "."));
 80:                 $filename  = str_replace(".min." . $extension, "." . $extension, $filename);
 81:                 $file = str_replace($pathname, "/", PowerHelperMinify::getMinifyFile($filename));
 82:             }
 83:             return file_get_contents($filename);
 84:         }
 85:         
 86:         /**
 87:          * Redimensiona a imagem
 88:          * 
 89:          * @param String $file endereço do arquivo
 90:          * @param Int $w largura da nova imagem
 91:          * @param Int $h altura da nova imagem
 92:          * @return String 
 93:          */
 94:         private static function resizeImage($file, $w, $h) 
 95:         {
 96:             $filename = POWERCMS_PATH_PUBLIC . "/" . $file;
 97:             if(!file_exists($filename)) { 
 98:                 $filename = POWERCMS_PATH_ROOT . "/" . $file;
 99:             }           
100:             $image = new PowerHelperImage($filename);
101:             if(($image->getHeight() > $h && $h < 1000) && ($image->getWidth() > $w && $w < 1000)) { 
102:                 $image->resize($w, $h);
103:             }
104:             $image->show();
105:         }
106:         
107:         /**
108:          * Executa o metodo desejado 
109:          * 
110:          * @param String $namespaceController namespace da metodo
111:          * @param String $uri uri que está sendo acessado o metodo
112:          * @param String $label prefixo inicial das classes 
113:          * @return int
114:          */
115:         private function execute($namespaceController, $uri, $label = NULL) 
116:         { 
117:             $this->_routes = explode("/", $uri, 3);
118:             $className  = (empty($this->_routes[0]) || is_numeric($this->_routes[0])) ? self::CLASS_DEFAULT : $this->_routes[0];
119:             $class      = $namespaceController . $label . ucfirst(strtolower($className));
120:             $methodName = (empty($this->_routes[1]) || is_numeric($this->_routes[1]) ? self::METHOD_DEFAULT : $this->_routes[1]);
121:             if(class_exists($class)) { 
122:                 $classInstance = new $class();
123:                 if(!empty($methodName) && method_exists($classInstance, $methodName)) { 
124:                     $classInstance->{$methodName}($this->getParamsUri($this->_routes));
125:                 } else {
126:                     return 404;
127:                 }
128:             } else { 
129:                 return 404;
130:             }  
131:             return 1;
132:         }
133:         
134:         /**
135:          * 
136:          * @param String $module modulo a ser executado
137:          * @return void
138:          * @throws PowerExceptionNotFound
139:          */
140:         public function run($module) 
141:         { 
142:             if(POWERCMS_DOMAIN_ID == null || POWERCMS_SECRET_KEY == null) { 
143:                     $module = "Setup";
144:                     $uri = empty($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER]) ? "/" : rtrim($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER], "/");
145:                     switch($this->execute(self::getNamespaceControllerSetupPowerCMS(), $uri, "")) { 
146:                         case 404: throw new PowerExceptionNotFound("NotFound", 404);                    
147:                     }                    
148:                     return ;
149:             }
150:             self::$_module = $module;
151:             if(!empty($_GET[self::KEY_IMAGE]) && !empty($_GET["w"])) { 
152:                 $w = PowerHelperInput::GET("w", PowerHelperDataType::TYPE_INTEGER);
153:                 $h = PowerHelperInput::GET("h", PowerHelperDataType::TYPE_INTEGER);
154:                 die(self::resizeImage($_GET[self::KEY_IMAGE], $w, $h)); 
155:             }
156:             if(!empty($_GET[self::KEY_MINIFY])) { 
157:                 die(self::minify($_GET[self::KEY_MINIFY])); 
158:             }
159:             if(!empty($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER_POWERCMS])) { 
160:                 $uri = str_replace(array("PowerCMS/", "powercms/"), "", (empty($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER_POWERCMS]) ? "/" : rtrim($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER_POWERCMS], "/")));
161:                 switch($this->execute(self::getNamespaceControllerPowerCMS(), $uri, "PowerController")) { 
162:                     case 404: throw new PowerExceptionNotFound("NotFound", 404);                    
163:                 }
164:                 return; 
165:             }
166:             $uri = empty($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER]) ? "/" : rtrim($_GET[self::KEY_ROUTER], "/");
167:             switch($this->execute(self::getNamespaceController(), $uri)) { 
168:                 case 404: throw new PowerExceptionNotFound("Page not found", 404);                    
169:             }
170:         }
171:         
172:         
173:         /**
174:          * Retorna os parametros GET da rota acessada
175:          * 
176:          * @param array $route rota que está sendo accessada
177:          * @return Array
178:          */
179:         private function getParamsUri(Array $route) 
180:         { 
181:             if(!empty($route[0]) && is_numeric($route[0])) { 
182:                 return array($route[0]);
183:             }else 
184:             if(!empty($route[1]) && is_numeric($route[1])) { 
185:                 return array($route[1]);
186:             } else
187:             if(!empty($route[2])){
188:                 return explode("/", $route[2]);
189:             }
190:             return array();
191:         }
192:         
193:         /**
194:          *  @return String Namespace do Controller da APP
195:          */
196:         private function getNamespaceController() 
197:         { 
198:             return self::NAMESPACE_CONTROLLER . (empty(self::$_module) ? "" : self::$_module . "\\");
199:         }
200:         
201:         /**
202:          *  @return String Módulo Atual
203:          */
204:         public static function getCurrentModule() 
205:         { 
206:             return empty(self::$_module) ? "" : self::$_module;
207:         }
208:         
209:         /**
210:          *  @return String Namespace do Controller do PowerCMS
211:          */
212:         private function getNamespaceControllerPowerCMS() 
213:         { 
214:             return self::NAMESPACE_CONTROLLER_POWERCMS;
215:         }
216:         
217:         /**
218:          *  @return String Namespace do Controller do PowerCMS Setup
219:          */
220:         private function getNamespaceControllerSetupPowerCMS() 
221:         { 
222:             return self::NAMESPACE_CONTROLLER_POWERCMS_SETUP;
223:         }
224:         
225:     }
